data.comment: Sergey Karasev starts the match. Lokomotiv Moscow with the kick-off in Moscow.
Sergey Karasev signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Hwang In-beom gives Rubin Kazan a 0-1 lead in Moscow.
In the minute 3, Oleg Shatov with an assist there.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
Maksim Muhin (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a yellow card from Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 6, Rubin Kazan surge into the attack at RZD Arena but Ivan Ignatyevâ€™s header is off-target.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 9, Lokomotiv Moscow are coming forward and Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at RZD Arena.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 10, Lokomotiv Moscow pushes forward through Grzegorz Krychowiak, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In the minute 13, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
In the minute 15, Sergey Karasev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vladislav Ignatev grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at RZD Arena.
In the minute 20, Vladislav Ignatev for Lokomotiv Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 20, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at RZD Arena.
Vitali Lisakovich (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ivan Ignatyev (Rubin Kazan) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
In the minute 25, Sergey Karasev signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Lokomotiv Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 26, Aleksandr Zuev is booked for the away team.
Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Anton Miranchuk fires in a strike for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Georgi Zotov for Rubin Kazan has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 30, At RZD Arena, Lokomotiv Moscow are penalized for being offside.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 32, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 34, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Rubin Kazan drives forward and Denis Makarov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 40, Rubin Kazan's Ivan Ignatyev breaks free at RZD Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 42, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow just outside Rubin Kazan's area.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk misses with an attempt on goal.
Sergey Karasev awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow drive upfield at RZD Arena and Vedran Corluka hits the bar with a header.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Rubin Kazan kick-off.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Ivan Ignatyev (Rubin Kazan) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 50, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 53, Lokomotiv Moscow's Grzegorz Krychowiak gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Vladislav Ignatev is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rubin Kazan are pushing forward but Denis Makarov's finish is wide of the goal.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, In Moscow, Denis Makarov of Rubin Kazan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Lokomotiv Moscow push forward at RZD Arena and Grzegorz Krychowiak gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rubin Kazan defence.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Grzegorz Krychowiak gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Rubin Kazan needs to be cautious. Lokomotiv Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
In the minute 60, Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Rubin Kazan, close to Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
Eder is replacing Francois Kamano for the home team.
Rubin Kazan are pushing forward but Mikhail Merkulov's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been given a penalty at RZD Arena...
In the minute 69, At RZD Arena, Nikita Medvedev has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Anton Miranchuk smashes in a penalty at RZD Arena. The score is now 2-1.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 73, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia is replacing Aleksandr Zuev for Rubin Kazan at RZD Arena.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Murilo Cerqueira has been booked in Moscow.
In the minute 75, Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Darko Jevtic is on a sub for Hwang In-beom for Rubin Kazan.
Carl Starfelt for Rubin Kazan drives towards goal at RZD Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 76, Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Lokomotiv Moscow are whistled for offside.
In Moscow Rubin Kazan drive forward through Khvicha Kvaratskhelia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Eder for Lokomotiv Moscow is whistled offside.
In the minute 80, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vitali Lisakovich (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 84, Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Oleg Shatov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Soltmurad Bakaev (Rubin Kazan) has replaced the possibly injured Oleg Shatov.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 86, Goal! Vladislav Ignatev extends Lokomotiv Moscow's lead to 3-1.
Vitali Lisakovich instrumental with a fine assist.
Sergey Karasev signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
In the minute 88, Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Oliver Abildgaard gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Moscow.
Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Moscow.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Free kick in a good position for Rubin Kazan!
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Sergey Karasev awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 3-1.
Marko Nikolic is making the team's second substitution at RZD Arena with Nikolai Titkov replacing Vitali Lisakovich.
The home team have replaced Anton Miranchuk with Nikita Iosifov. This is the third substitution made today by Marko Nikolic.
